fig_caption:
The heart is normal in size.  The mediastinal and hilar contours
 appear within normal range.  Costophrenic sulci are partly excluded, but there
 is no evidence for pleural effusion.  There is no pneumothorax.  There is a
 patchy right mid lung opacity, not present before and suggesting a subtle
 focus of infection.  Streaky left basilar opacity is also present in the
 retrocardiac region.
